snippet: A Liberian court on Tuesday sentenced 13 people to life imprisonment for cross-border raids into Ivory Coast that killed seven U.N. peacekeepers in a controversial case....

headline.print_headline: Liberia Convicts 13 for Killing Peacekeepers in Ivorian Raids
headline.main: Liberia Convicts 13 for Killing Peacekeepers in Ivorian Raids

lead_paragraph: A Liberian court on Tuesday sentenced 13 people to life imprisonment for cross-border raids into Ivory Coast that killed seven U.N. peacekeepers in a controversial case.
